Uses of Package
org.w3c.dom.xpath

Packages that use org.w3c.dom.xpath
org.apache.xpath.domapi Implements DOM Level 3 XPath API 
org.w3c.dom.xpath   
 

Classes in org.w3c.dom.xpath used by org.apache.xpath.domapi
XPathEvaluator
          The evaluation of XPath expressions is provided by XPathEvaluator.
XPathException
          A new exception has been created for exceptions specific to these XPath interfaces.
XPathExpression
          The XPathExpression interface represents a parsed and resolved XPath expression.
XPathNSResolver
          The XPathNSResolver interface permit prefix strings in the expression to be properly bound to namespaceURI strings.

XPathExpression
          The XPathExpression interface represents a parsed and resolved XPath expression.
XPathNSResolver
          The XPathNSResolver interface permit prefix strings in the expression to be properly bound to namespaceURI strings.
